data.message: Eminem current music ain't shit to his music from 1996 to 2004 lyrically.

replies.message:
You got it mixed up. 
Lyrically he has never been better than he is right now. Flow-wise however, I like it but can see why many don't. It's not as fluent to the beat as it was, it's more like he records a verse and then adds a beat to it.
Wrong... He is at his peak now!! Flow unmatched on this planet
Cause is flow is fast on it? Lol.
He is confusing now he wants to be his old self because he know the drugs screwed his brain up and he isn't ask lyrical as he once was.
Even though I also prefer the old em, it's really amazing seeing the changes he has gone through reflected in his music.. Thats why I love old em until before encore and i liked recovery
Lyrically he's getting better with age. I personally like his current music better. There's more meaning to the songs. And he's talking about more than killing bitches, and doing drugs.

What? He isnt ask lyrical... Ok we believe what u say... No one has heard of him and hes not good... Youre right... Id have a hard time hearing understanding his lyrics too if I was a little slow myself... Hes a bit too slow if u axe me...
So you find Encore lyrical compared to Relapse?
